messages.content: Hello! How can I help you today?
Are you a writer and are you currently working on a novel

I am a language model trained to respond to a wide range of questions and prompts, but I am not trained to write novels. However, I am always open to learning new writing techniques and ideas, so if you would like to collaborate on a novel, I would be happy to hear your ideas and help you create a draft.

Convert this to bullet points First, apply tool adjust using the following parameters: vignetteCentre (please choose the setting value 50), highlights (please choose the setting value 30) and  enhance (please choose the setting value 9.7).
Then, effect kandinsky using special brush.
Lastly, adjust your perspective to horizontal_angle of 20.

-   Apply vignetteCentre of 50 to the image
-   Set highlights of 30 to the image
-   Choose enhance of 9.7 to apply a kandinsky effect to the image
-   Change your perspective to a horizontal angle of 20
